channel.title: GameObjects size, position & rotation
channel.description:
Would someone mind explaining the basics about how game objects are instantiated in the #317 revision? I understand the data is loaded out of the cache etc, but I can't figure out the correlations between the different pieces of data and how everything is calculated.
Thanks!

item.title: GameObjects size, position & rotation
item.dc:creator: @_nova1 _nova
item.description:
@_nova1 wrote:

In GameObjectConfig

Width, Length

Position/Rotation is stored in map files.

Read full topic
